structure.unit: ARTICLE XII. PUBLIC AND BUS PASSENGER BENCHES AND SHELTERS

text.section:
Sec. 21-152. Miami-Dade Transit Agency duties.
MDTA shall be charged with the following duties and responsibilities:
Provide permittee with a complete and accurate list of all MDTA authorized bus stops.
Advise permittee of any changes in the list of MDTA authorized bus stops.
Enforce the provisions of this article.
Forward requests, complaints, etc. to permittee and attempt to resolve same.
Assign an exclusive identification number to be displayed on each bench.
Issue permits for bus passenger benches pursuant to the provisions of this article and maintain appropriate files regarding same.
Investigate and prepare reports on alleged violations of this article.
Perform any other duties assigned by the County Manager.
